name: Siftly
headline: Growth OS for your D2C brand
description: Analytics tailored for your D2C brand to save money and grow by cutting customer costs.

founders.name: Chalam PVS, Founder
founders.description: Chalam is the CEO and co-founder of Airdot. Before founding Airdot, he led Data Science and Machine Learning projects at companies such as Snapdeal and Fareportal for more than 7 years. He is from India and graduated from IIT Guwahati in 2015.

founders.name: Sandilya Miduthuri, Founder
founders.description: Building Siftly. Ex-Software Engineer @ Microsoft, Flipkart & Qualcomm. From India and graduated with Bachelors in CS from IIIT-Hyderabad.

generated_description:
Siftly is a promising startup founded in 2021 and hailing from Gurugram, India. This company operates within the fast-evolving realm of direct-to-consumer (D2C) brands, and it proudly emerged from Y Combinator's Batch W22. With a compact team of just two employees, Siftly is setting its sights high: their mission is to be the growth operating system for D2C brands.

Initially conceived as an analytics tool, Siftly is now evolving into a comprehensive platform aimed at saving money for D2C brands by optimizing logistics and fulfillment processes. Their tagline succinctly captures their focus: they help brands cut shipping costs, speed up deliveries, and minimize cancellations by ensuring that orders are fulfilled from the nearest warehouse. In fact, they claim that most brands waste between 15% to 30% on unnecessary shipping costs—an inefficiency they aim to eradicate.

So, how does Siftly do this? Their features include:

- **Optimized Shipping**: By analyzing fulfillment data, Siftly allows brands to see where they are overspending and provides actionable insights for cost savings.
- **Real-Time Tracking**: Users can monitor their savings as they optimize their logistics, ensuring every small improvement contributes to larger gains.
- **Strategic Stocking Recommendations**: Siftly leverages data science to advise brands on which SKUs to stock at different warehouses based on regional demand and historical sales data.

These tools not only help in identifying inefficiencies but also in implementing effective change, turning logistics headaches into streamlined processes. In a world where every penny counts, Siftly is an ally for D2C brands looking to sharpen their operational edges.

Ultimately, Siftly is a sophisticated blend of artificial intelligence, generative AI, data analytics, and e-commerce expertise—a potent combination for any brand seeking to thrive in the competitive D2C landscape. They are offering a free analysis tool that promises to uncover hidden shipping costs, so if you’re in this space, it’s worth checking out their website at [siftly.ai](https://siftly.ai/).
